text: Arau ami chamuda jatira ocarata sihamtara bhatr chalehaka praerana karaichilo. Te'om kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke allahara ibadata karaa, te'omra bahirae tomalokara ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Teraemi tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaiche arau tate'i te'om tomalokara basabasa karaara byarastha karaiche. Gatike tomaloke te'omra ocarata ksama praarthana karaa arau te'omra pine'i ubhati aha. Niscaya mora raba ati ocarata, ahbanata samharai pradanakarai’
